TopicTitle: Does anybody else play Endless Sky?

Articles.Content: Topic is in the title. I've been playing more of this game recently, and in fact I'm going to start making gaming videos with this game, nailing down techniques before I move to other games.
Never played it before I saw this thread. Downloaded it last night and played it for a couple of hours. Pretty cool, reminds me of the old Traveller RPG, without the RPG part.

Of course I do, it's the spiritual sequel to Escape Velocity which I've played so much in my childhood

I'd watch videos.

Woot Woot! Funny you brought that up. Endless Sky is my second favorite game (just narrowly above Empyrion-Galactic Survival) short of KSP. I have over 50 hours of it. I would definitely watch videos on it.
Yes, but I find i clunky and slow. I play Elite dangerous horizons Fyi.
